name: Spooky Forest FPS Adventure!
description:
Explore this spooky forest, get to the end to find out the mystery!

CONTROLS:

WASD - move
Shift - hold while moving to run
Space - Jump
L. Mouse Button - Shoot
R. Mouse Button - Hold to Zoom In (Finger Gun only)
Scroll Wheel / number keys - Cycle through weapons

3 weapons! (Ammo for the weapon you are currently using is shown on the top right of the screen.)

Finger Gun  - Longest range, lowest cooldown and damage. Can zoom in while holding the right mouse button.

Check My Nails Gun - Medium range, longer cooldown, higher damage. 

Five Finger Death Punch Gun - Very short range, very long cooldown, 1-shot kill damage.

Pickups:

Batteries - You will find a few batteries spread throughout the level. Your flashlight will slowly lose brightness and range over time, the batteries will help with that! 

Enemies have a chance to drop golden spinny pickups, those are ammo for your guns! The type of ammo it is corresponds to the look of the weapon it refills.

You can win by killing all the enemies in the last area (you'll know the one ;)).
